channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16239] Better logging for RPC related exceptions
item.description: On many occasions, we have to debug RPC related issues, but it is hard in AP + RetryingRpcCaller since we mask the stack traces until all retries have been exhausted (which takes 10 minutes by default).
item.summary: Better logging for RPC related exceptions

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.

comments.comment: HBASE-16149 was trying to do something similar. It is in branch-1 and master. But you can do more on top of it.
Jerry He v2 incorporates the added msg from HBASE-16149 as well.
